full_summary:
=============
**Tender Announcement: Event Management Services for the Annual Canadian Congress on Disability Inclusion**

**Solicitation Number:** 100021940
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01013235
**Modification Number:** 3
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-09T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2022-12-05
**Contract Start Date:** To be determined
**Contract End Date:** To be determined

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and other agreements.

**Location:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
**End User Entity:** ESDC - Accessible Canada Directorate (ACD)

**Tender Description:**
employs seeks a service provider for hybrid (virtual and in-person) event management services for the annual Canadian Congress on Disability Inclusion (CCDI) for a period of one (1) year, plus four (4) one-year option periods. The chosen provider will be responsible for managing events with multiple locations and attendees. A call for proposals (RFP) process is initiated for the contract. The successful bidder will be awarded a one-year contract, with potential extension periods.

**Attachments:**
* documents for more information on the project, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Contact Information:**
Marco Quiroga, contact person: NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca. more officers of the agency may inquire via email. Telephone contact details at this office are not included. Further information can be found in the avails/Desc vag contribution.
